headline: Why Broadcom (AVGO) Shares Are Falling Today
summary: Shares of fabless chip and software maker Broadcom (NASDAQ:AVGO) fell 4.2% in the morning session after stocks in the semiconductor sector pulled back, driven by underwhelming news from key industry peers.
